alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 9:11PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Palm Beach County through 945 PM EDT... At 911 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over South Bay. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belle Glade, South Bay, Lake Harbor, Okeelanta and Belle Glade Camp. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.
